title: Shiiku Hime
sinopse:
Takanezawa Hime is girl from a wealthy family. When they were small she started bullying Asakawa Nachi. Under Hime's guidance she wants Nachi to become her ideal pet. And thats why Nachi always obey to Hime's commands. (Source: Sugar-Oasis)

Also includes the oneshot "Jun'ai Koza Kemono Shiyou".
